# fun packages

## animals

```{r}
library(fortunes)
# call a quote
  fortune()
# call and search for a quote topic
    fortune("hello")
```

```{r}
library(cowsay)
say("Hello World!")
# change it a bit:
someone_say_hello <- function() {
  animal <- sample(animals, 1)
  say(paste("Hello, I'm a ", animal,".", collapse = ""), by = animal)
}
someone_say_hello()
```

```{r}
someone_say_my_fortune <- function() {
  animal <- sample(animals, 1)
  say(paste(fortune(), collapse = "\n"), by = animal)
}
someone_say_my_fortune()
```
